pages.text: The base scroll used for all the scroll types.

pages.title: Scroll of Knowledge
pages.text: Used to store your experience inside the scroll.$(br2)Use on a soul to store all your experience in the scroll.$(br2)Use the scroll again when its glowing to restore the experience inside the scroll.

pages.title: Scroll of Preservation
pages.text: The scroll will allow you to keep your experience and active effects applied to you on death.$(br2)Use on a soul to activate the effect$(br2)Effect lasts 11 minutes.

pages.title: Scroll of Intangibility
pages.text: The scroll will prevent damge for a whole second, every 5 seconds.$(br2)Use on a soul to activate the effect$(br2)Effect lasts 11 minutes.

pages.title: Scroll of FeatherFalling
pages.text: The scroll causes you to fall slowly, you also take no damage when you land.$(br2)Use on a soul to activate the effect$(br2)Effect lasts 11 minutes.

pages.title: Scroll of Purification
pages.text: The scroll gives you and effect that removes your negative effects throught its duration.$(br2)Use on a soul to activate the effect$(br2)Effect lasts 11 minutes.

pages.title: Scroll of TrueSight
pages.text: The scroll will gives you night vision.$(br2)Use on a soul to activate the effect$(br2)Effect lasts 11 minutes.

pages.title: Scroll of Reach
pages.text: The scroll increases your reach.$(br2)Use on a soul to activate the effect$(br2)Effect lasts 11 minutes.

pages.title: Scroll of Lightning
pages.text: The scroll prevents lightning damage.$(br2)Use on a soul to activate the effect$(br2)Effect lasts 11 minutes.
